website_summaries.verdict: The women's daypack features good weight distribution and comfortable design elements like a CrossFlo suspension.
pros: Has a total of 6 roomy exterior pockets, as well as 2 interior (one slip, one zip)
Good weight distribution, and very comfortable
Several colors to choose from, including dark charcoal and mountain purple
cons: Doesn't come with a bladder or hose (although it is set up to accommodate both)
front does not open to the main compartment

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking daypack!
customer_reviews.text: Nice daypack! Good weight distribution to the hips. The pockets are great and roomy, and the pack cinches down small when it's not stuffed full so it is low profile. Hip pockets can fit an iphone 6s. Love that it has a rain cover. This is will also fit my 15inch laptop for traveling, but I plan to put something soft at the bottom first for protection. I also have the Jade 60 for backpacking, so I'm a fan of Gregory products. I am 5 feet tall, 16inch torso, the small fits nicely. Tried the medium on in the store and it was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Daypack for Women
customer_reviews.text: Have had several day packs for hiking but this has to be the best one for a shorter woman. Adjustable and extremely comfortable. It's maiden voyage was on an eight mile mountain hike. Preformed wonderfully and I had it packed. It was 34 degrees when we started and had plenty of room for all the clothing I shed as the day warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Warner

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing! So worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This pack is definitely designed with women in mind. It fits perfectly! The padding is very comfortable. It is comfortable to wear even with a full 3L hydration bladder in it. In fact, it’s really even more comfortable and stable with some weight in it. Plenty of compartments designed with hiking and backpacking in mind. All the clasps and seams are well made and sturdy. The frame is a flawless design for breathability and comfort. I ordered two other cheaper pack before getting this one and had to return them both because the sizing was off and the frames were terrible and uncomfortable. The difference with a well made pack is amazing. I highly recommend this pack!
customer_reviews.author: AmyVsings

customer_reviews.title: Could it be...perfect?
customer_reviews.text: I especially love the tiny design touch of a loop for my sunglasses on the shoulder strap! Ideal arrangement of pockets and quite comfortable. I have always been fond of Gregory packs but my Miwok has too many pockets (I didn't know that was possible) and is too floppy to make access easy. The support system makes the Jade a little heavier but it's utterly worth it for the easier access imho. Using it for dayhiking with hubs and kiddo - big enough for all our stuff in one pack.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: It’s just the right size for a day hike. I sweat a lot especially my back. The support helps. The two pockets at the waist are too small to fit a plus size iPhone though they are practical and could be used for other small items. The rain cover comes in handy and is very water proof (able to keep my backpack dry in heavy rain). Overall, it meets my need.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Li

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function
customer_reviews.text: This pack fits great and is more than sufficient in size for a long day hike or even a short overnighter. Lots of pockets and organization options. The hydration sleeve fits my water pack nicely. It is extremely well made, durable and a very reputable brand. The belt pockets fit a larger phone and snacks for easy accessibility. I am really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P

customer_reviews.title: it is a little more deep for what I wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a little more deep for what I wanted. It was a little bit of a pain - but then again if you are hiking out for a whole day you don't need to get into it as much as we did. If you are looking for a deeper section internally, this is your thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable backpack
customer_reviews.text: Did 7 day backcountry hike with this pack (day pack) and it worked very nicely. Good number of pockets without too many. The design keeps the pack off your back but the firm inside sleeve is thick so there was a bit more heat on my back than I would have liked. Otherwise very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela van Giessen

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift after buying one for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift after buying one for myself and loving it! Note: It works as a carry on for most domestic flights but is too big for international ones.
customer_reviews.author: eddy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been a backpacker for over 20 and have visited. This was a gift for a friend, she loved it...
customer_reviews.author: Rafael valentin

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but found it too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag but found it too heavy. I was looking for something really light for a 3 week trip and i have a bad back. Nice features just too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used it in New Zealand and worked out really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & well balanced
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack with convenient features. I found it comfortable with no strain on my shoulders or hips after a day of climbing over huge downed tree trunks over the trail. I felt stable and well balanced wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PACK!!! The price was great and it fits me perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality material
customer_reviews.text: Backpack worked and was comfortable for a whole year trip.
customer_reviews.author: David Matlaw

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking pack
customer_reviews.text: I use it for day hikes. Very spacious and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Sauve

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. So roomy and looks great too! I had to return because it was too big for what i needed but is still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: rkb

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS DAYPACK!
customer_reviews.text: I do lots of day hiking and backpacking. This 28L Jade is replacing my REI 40L Trail pack. I'm trying to lighten my load so decided to try a 28L pack. Not only is this roomy but the suspension and internal frame is one of the most comfortable packs I've ever used. This is my first Gregory pack and I'm sold. I've used it for a couple of weeks and loaded about 20pds each time. Love all the compartments and open pouches. LOVE IT! I highly recommend as a woman's daypack! I bought purple and it's beautiful. The red is also very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Girl

product_meta.title: Gregory Mountain Products Jade 28 Liter Women's Backpack
product_meta.description: Call it a daypack if you like, but the Jade 28 is much more. The bridge effect of CrossFlo suspension keeps you cool and dry in all conditions, and features like dual stretch side pockets, dual hipbelt pockets, an integrated raincover, and trekking pole attach points that double as ice axe loops make this lower-volume pack capable of anything from ridge running to ice climbing or bike touring.
feature_bullets: VENTILATED SUSPENSION & TOP ACCESS: Updated CrossFlo Suspension. Women's-specific design. Hybrid top loading panel access to main body.
AMPLE STORAGE TO ORGANIZE YOUR TRIP: Zippered pockets on exterior and interior of hybrid panel access. Two external stretch water bottle pockets.
FREE RAIN COVER & EASY ACCESS TO IMPORTANT GEAR: Dual quick-access waist belt pockets. Trekking pole attachment points double as ice axe loops. Integrated rain cover.
KEEP YOUR ACCESSORIES HANDY: Interior security pocket with key clip. Sunglass stash on shoulder harness.
IDEAL USES: Day Hiking, Camping, Walking, Travel - WEIGHT: 2.7 lbs. - DIMENSIONS: 19.0" x 12.0" x 8.0"
Pockets: 1 interior slip, 1 interior zip, 6 exterior
